title: A Guardian Reborn
goal: The immediate threat is contained, but the larger conflict is recognized. Kaelen accepts his renewed purpose.

beats.summary: Kaelen, with the aid of his allies' sacrifice and support, manages to contain or significantly weaken the Blight's core, pushing back its influence from the land.
The immediate danger is averted, but Kaelen understands the Blight is not destroyed, merely dormant or diminished, requiring eternal vigilance.
Kaelen fully accepts his role as the Awakened Sage, no longer burdened by lost memories but committed to guiding the world against future threats, his journey only just beginning.
